title: Eurovision's Big Birthday Tour
summary: The Eurovision Song Contest is having a special live tour for its 70th birthday. This tour will start after this year's big final and travel to many cities in Europe, beginning in London. Famous singers from the past 70 years of Eurovision will perform their own songs and cover other favorite Eurovision tunes. The tour is a fun way for fans to see a show like the real contest, especially if they couldn't get tickets. It celebrates Eurovision's history and looks forward to more music in the future. The exact singers for the tour will be announced later, after this year's contest ends.

background_read: The Eurovision Song Contest is a fun music event that has been happening for 70 years. Countries in Europe pick singers to perform songs, and people vote for their favorites. It's like a big party with music from all over Europe. The live tour is a new idea to bring this excitement to more cities, so everyone can join the celebration.
